Camera.Flash:: Zeiss optics, Ring-LED flash, panorama, HDR
Camera.Second camera:: 50 MP, f/2.7, 85mm (periscope telephoto), 1/1.95", 0.8µm, PDAF, OIS, 3.7x optical zoom

Design.Colors:: Golden Hour, Alpine Gray (Sand Beige), Sandalwood Brown, Canary (Lemon) Yellow, Authentic Black, Passion Red
Design.Materials:: Glass front, aluminum alloy frame, glass back or fiber-reinforced plastic back
Design.Biometrics:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, compass, proximity
Design.Resistance:: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

90W wired, PD
Reverse wired
Bypass charging

Display.Features:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, compass, proximity

Hardware.OS:: Android 16, up to 4 major Android upgrades, OriginOS 6
